name: Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
synopsis: Street Fighter IIâ„¢ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting game genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting was the third release of the original Street Fighter II series. Featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile - along with playable boss characters Balrog, Vega, Sagat and M. Bison - Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting offers enhanced gameplay speed and improved character balancing. This is the US version of the game.
